FOUND IN: Around the bend – A figurative expression implying being in various unpredictable locations.
Sagacious (wise and judicious, attributes of legendary figures)
Sticky (since both adhesive and muggy can be associated with stickiness)
Figurehead (noun) – a symbolic leader of an organization without real power but held in place as a tradition; used metaphorically, it can also mean a representative figure
Crab (distinctive sideways walking, often found in seafood dishes)
